name: Obmil
description:
Explore an infinite "dereality-like" house whilst reading anonymous confessions from the internet.

EDIT This version is bugged, and as it is a jam submission, we can't change until the voting ends. If you want to play the fixed version, try this link EDIT

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Flashlight - LMB

Fullscreen - F11

Follow us on twitter, @pinaunastudios!

Programmer: Rafael Vital (@rafavla32)

Artist: Vidiot (@isItTacio)

Design and QA: Scharma (@Scharma17)

3D furniture by @SoilFertile.
